alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe in Maui (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 09 at 1:06AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM HST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR THE ISLAND OF LANAI IN MAUI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The island of Lanai in Maui County. * WHEN...Until 245 AM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 104 AM HST, radar indicated heavy rain has moved offshore east of Lanai. Additional showers are expected to move in from the south with rain rates up to 1 inch per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lanai City, Manele and Lanai Airport. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 245 AM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding. Rainfall and runoff will also cause hazardous driving conditions due to ponding, reduced visibility and poor braking action.
